item.title: Create github blog by jekyll
item.description:
1,Jekyll introduction

the web site is https://jekyllrb.com

It transform your plain text , such as markdown file , into static web pages.

Since github offer us the possibility that we build our own static web site , jekyll become to ...

Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, reman voluptatem amico percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. item.title: 002_定语从句
item.description:
定语从句

定义：定语是用来修饰、限定、说明名词或代词的品质与特征的。定语的位置一般有两种：用在所修饰词之前的叫前置定语，用在所修饰词之后的叫后置定语。

后置定语英文示例：

1.A man of his word

2.The way to heaven

3.The guy you love

后置定语类型：

  1. N + adj 短语 A man
